description.en: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.ar: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.br: Este item dará uma nova aparência aleatória ao seu pet. Há uma chance de obter visuais raros!
description.cns: 可以随机更改宠物外观，有几率获得稀有外观！
description.de: Gibt deinem Aufzucht-Pet ein neues und zufälliges Erscheinungsbild. Mit etwas Glück sogar ein seltenes Erscheinungsbild!
description.fi: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.fil: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.fr: Cet objet donnera une nouvelle apparence aléatoire à votre familier. Il y a une chance d'obtenir des visuels rares!
description.id: Item ini akan mengubah tampilan Pet secara random. Ada kemungkinan akan mendapatkan tampilan langka!
description.it: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.jp: このアイテムは、ペットに新しいランダムな外観を与えます。レアビジュアルゲットのチャンスあり！
description.kr: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.nl: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.pl: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.ru: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.sp: Este artículo le dará una nueva apariencia aleatoria a tu mascota. ¡Podrías obtener imágenes raras!
description.sw: This item will give a new random appearance to your pet. There is a chance to get rare visuals!
description.th: ไอเทมนี้จะสุ่มรูปลักษณ์ใหม่ให้กับสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณ มีโอกาสที่จะได้รับrare!
description.tw: 這道具會給你的寵物一個新的隨機外觀，有機會獲得稀有視覺效果！
description.vi: Vật phẩm này sẽ mang đến một diện mạo ngẫu nhiên mới cho thú cưng của bạn. Có cơ hội nhận được những hình ảnh hiếm có!
